Bowen’s file in the Providence City Archives is labelled 1807, although the only documents it contains date from 1815 which suggests that he was placed under guardianship in 1807 and 1815. His first guardian was his father, Jabez Brown, but after his father’s death in 1815, Thomas Arnold, another prominent Providence businessman related to the Bowens by marriage, was appointed guardian.
